item.title: About
item.description: United States Air Force Veteran Sr. Solutions Architect at VMware. Working Modern Application Business Unit (MAPBU). focuses on Automation, Integration and Operation of the VMware Software Defined Datacenter (SDDC), and the TANZU product portfolio. Experienced Network and Cloud Engineer with a demonstrated history of working in the Defense & Space industry. Skilled in Cisco Networking, Satellite, Cisco IOS and Nexus, AWS, VSphere, Kubernetes, and IP Multicast. Air Force Pathfinder for Pivotal Cloud Foundry initiative later to become the Air Force KesselRun Project.
